about_the_game:
Zombie virus Ukraine 2022 is a game in which our main character is faced with the fact that massively armed, infected people began to enter Ukraine across the border, as a result, chaos, cruelty, and massacres formed around.

An unknown virus has been introduced. The dead began to attack the living with pronounced rage and hunger.

The infected person has different stages of mutation: the first is when a person is seemingly alive, but shows hatred and tries to kill you just like that, the second stage is when the dead, whose brain was not damaged by death, comes to life again and such people have increased aggression and severe hunger.

Zombie Virus Ukraine 2022 – A game in which our main character is faced with the fact that massively armed, infected people began to enter Ukraine across the border, resulting in chaos, cruelty, and massacres all around.

An unknown virus was introduced. The dead began to attack the living with pronounced rage and hunger.

The times of real survival are coming, people have organized themselves and united into groups, creating communities, each community has its own rules and its own leader. Communities strive to develop and build relationships with other communities, making friends and trading with some, and at enmity with others.
In each community there is different work, someone is engaged in farming, someone stands on duty and shoots zombies and ill-wishers, and someone makes forays into cities to find supplies, if there are no resources in the community, then such a community will fall to its other people will come in their place, people who have adapted to survive.

Any resources are very important because you will have to build, repair, manufacture, and it depends on you whether you will go and put everything in a backpack or still find the missing parts and put one of the cars in motion so that you can go on forays and bring more resources, because it is important so that the community would grow and people of all specialties would live in it, especially doctors, because in a harsh world you will encounter various diseases, because if you constantly run and your body sweats and is cold, then you will at least catch a cold, and there will be a cough, sore throat, and if your health is neglected it will be worse than a cold!

Outside you will have to deal with infected living dead who will try to eat you at the first opportunity.
The infected person has different stages of mutation: the first is when a person appears to be alive, but shows hatred and tries to kill you just like that, the second stage is when a dead person whose brain was not damaged during death comes to life again and these people experience increased aggression and severe hunger.

Collaborate with scientists, scientists examine zombie organs and try to understand the origin of the virus in order to create an antivirus, by the way, they pay well for the zombie organs that you bring them.

Outside the communities, do not rush to kill everyone who gets in your way, because you don’t know who is there on the other side of the street, maybe this someone is a doctor who will join your community.

You can also enlist in the Z.S.U because there is plenty to do there, because on the territory of Ukraine there are not only the living dead, but also the remnant of the occupiers who pose a serious threat! Or you can become a bandit and try to enforce your own law, but then Z.S.U will attack you!

Or remain alone, survive, contact the NPC and build relationships, it is up to you who you will be friends with and with whom you will be at enmity, artificial intelligence has different moods and an unpredictable behavior pattern, it is difficult to predict where the NPC will go and what it will do.

You will have to survive and defend yourself where the walking dead are marauders and occupiers.
In the game you have access to such functions as:
1. Joining any of the communities.
2. Join the service of the Z.S.U, or you can become a Scientist, or join a group of bandits.
2. Open world exploration.
3. Elimination of the enemy.
4. trade.
5. Game character status indicator, hunger, thirst, stress, reputation, health.
6. Eat, drink and monitor your health, hunger and thirst.
7. Create rooms with workbenches for crafting items.

The game implements the reaction of an NPC to a cartridge hitting different parts of the body; you can eliminate them with one hit to the head, heart and other organs important to life, you can also injure and disable them, and it’s up to you to decide to leave the NPC to bleed or simply finish them off with a shot.

content_descriptors.notes: The game has a naked zombie as well as the constant killing of the enemy with a weapon, there is also the use of alcohol to lower the radiation of the game character.

An unknown virus has been introduced. The dead began to attack the living with pronounced rage and hunger.

name: Zombie virus Ukraine 2022

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8750H CPU @ 2.20GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 60 MB
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Post-apocalyptic world filled with zombies, invaders, criminals and just crazy people, try to survive and save those who need it, create a community or join an already ready one, also don’t let the virus and diseases stop you.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Ukrainian*
*languages with full audio support
